channel.title: RuneScape 317 HD Project
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]Description:[/SIZE]
The goal of this project is to develop a RuneScape client that renders using OpenGL and uses smoother texturing methods, this client is forked from the RuneScape source tree at RuneScape revision #317, and will not contain code and game data (with the exception of textures) from any newer RuneScape revisions, for now we are using RuneScape floor definitions from revision #508 but we will eventually modify a revision #317 file to our needs.
[SIZE=4]Project sites:[/SIZE]
GitHub for engine: [URL=https://github.com/Peterbjorn/PGLEngine2_LWJGL]https://github.com/Peterbjorn/PGLEngine2_LWJGL[/URL]
Googlecode for client: [URL=http://"http://code.google.com/p/rename317"]rename317 - A effort to fully rename the 317 client of runescape - Google Project Hosting[/URL]
[SIZE=4]Developers:[/SIZE]
[ul][*][USER]Sir Peter[/USER] [*][USER]Clienthax[/USER][/ul] [SIZE=4]Pictures :[/SIZE]
[size=3]30-7-11 - Skybox and (see for yourself below)[/size] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/245amic.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/5ca9s5.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]23-6-11 - Fog[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2eapen7.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]22/23-6-11(+/- midnight) - Road overlays and more sun fixes[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/ief0oi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2lscot0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/dcq0x5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/5np6d4.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]22-6-11 - FX Lights (WIP As you can see whole scene is lit):[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/e7cxlh.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]22-6-11 - OpenGL Lighting (WIP: Needs finetuning , too dark now)[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2873bc8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/5u0fv8.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]22-6-11 - More renderer and scenegraph upgrades:[/SIZE] Performance: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/125ow29.png[/img] Better looks: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/sl6xzk.png[/img] Projectile and GFX rendering: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/303ivjn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/5pnk9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/15372wi.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]21-6-11 - GroundItem rendering:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/fyq1eh.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=3]21-6-11 - Renderer upgrade (most objects now work):[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zexmar.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2qtaivm.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=3]20-6-11 - Textured object rendering and multiplayer:[/SIZE]
[B]Best screenshot of this revision i think:[/B] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/33xhp1v.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/r8bi87.png[/img]
[SIZE=3]19-6-11 - First object renderer done:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/96cj0x.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2dpe2d.png[/img]

item.title: RuneScape 317 HD Project
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:18, topic:400373”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=497448.msg3644271#msg3644271 date=1309254782]

I do have a question though, will we have to have a opengl compatible graphics card?

Any new-ish (probably even 2000+) graphics card will be OpenGL compatible, but also OpenGL can also be rendered in software mode, if it isn’t too slow to be playable.

@This topic, looks great so far, are you going to allow it to be resized too? Or just keep the standard dimensions?
[/quote]Oh okay, cause I cant play Minecraft/OpenGL on Runescape so didn’t know.

Minecraft requires OpenGL 1.3 I believe, something my last laptop lacked compatibility for. Might be the issue your having.[/quote]

Its OpenGL 1.1 i guess, thats what the banner says sometimes

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 317 HD Project
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:17, topic:400373”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=497448.msg3643734#msg3643734 date=1309210805]

I do have a question though, will we have to have a opengl compatible graphics card?

Any new-ish (probably even 2000+) graphics card will be OpenGL compatible, but also OpenGL can also be rendered in software mode, if it isn’t too slow to be playable.

@This topic, looks great so far, are you going to allow it to be resized too? Or just keep the standard dimensions?
[/quote]Oh okay, cause I cant play Minecraft/OpenGL on Runescape so didn’t know.[/quote]
Minecraft requires OpenGL 1.3 I believe, something my last laptop lacked compatibility for. Might be the issue your having.

Read full topic
